duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and execute electrical control systems for PLC-based combustion-related systems.
Create Ladder Logic designs for electrical controls and 480V / 3 Ph / 60 Hz Power Wiring Design.
Program PLC's such as Allen Bradley and Siemens for combustion-related systems.
Utilize strong electrical/mechanical aptitude and experience to support project requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
